data.name: Troll Hunter VR Demo
data.detailed_description:
Troll Hunter is a VR action-adventure about hunting terrifying trolls in '80s Scandinavia using your wit, shotgun, and DIY devices. Explore nordic nature, study trolls, hide and attack to protect civilians.

In this world, trolls are not a myth, they are close and very real, and your goal is to hunt them. You have to locate the troll, learn more about its surroundings and habits, and then lure them into the trap. Of course, in case things go wrong, you can always rely on your trusty weapons.

This version is packed with bits and pieces of the overall gameplay spread over the single troll site. Grab your shotgun, pack a car, and give it a try!

Please share your thoughts in reviews and Steam discussions!

data.short_description: In this demo of Troll Hunter VR action-adventure, you explore harsh nature, study trolls, set traps, and hunt them down to protect civilians. Get a taste of hunting for ghastly trolls in the alternative '80s Scandinavia, using your wit, trusty shotgun, and DIY devices.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 970
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce 1070
